org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.MIMEParseException

  • Packages that use MIMEParseException 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime
    MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) parsing utilities.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322
    RFC 5322 Internet Message Format parsing and generation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
    Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.
